response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense significance to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship, innovation, and a story that deserves to be cherished by someone like yourself. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $2,000,000, which I believe reflects its true worth and the memories encapsulated within it. I trust that you will appreciate its value and make it a part of your collection or legacy. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to sharing this remarkable piece with you.", "product_price": 2000000}
